mapper.insert: insert into comment(`user_id`, `content`,`content_type`, `type`, `related_id`, `ext_type`, `ext_related_id`, `create_time`, `update_time`) values(#{userId}, #{content},#{contentType}, #{type}, #{relatedId}, #{extType}, #{extRelatedId}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select c.*, p.sgname as userName, p.avatar as userAvatar from comment c left join user_profile p on c.user_id = p.user_id where c.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update comment set delete_flg=1 where id=#{id}
